title: moh
body: someone called (Yugolo) in league of legend Stoll my account, can you help me to return the account pls?

replies.body: We can help!  Reach out to our account team through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and we'll help get it back into your hands.  In the meantime, I suggest checking out our[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to secure your info in and outside of League.  Hang tight, we'll see you in your ticket!
someone called (Yugolo) in league of legend Stoll my account, can you help me to return the account pls?
